price: (ይህ በዘረፋ ክፍያ የከፊሉ ሰው መጥላት) ከምእምናን ከፊሉ የጠሉ ሲኾኑ ጌታህ ከቤትህ በእውነት ላይ ኾነህ እንዳወጣህ ነው፡፡
arabic: كَمَآ أَخۡرَجَكَ رَبُّكَ مِنۢ بَيۡتِكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَإِنَّ فَرِيقٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ لَكَٰرِهُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kamā akhrajaka rabbuka min baytika bil-ḥaqi wa-inna farīqan mina al-mu'minīna lakārihūna
